home.easy_steps: Easy steps to rent your perfect car
home.easy_steps_description: Renting a car with us is a breeze! Simply browse our extensive fleet to find the perfect vehicle for your needs.
home.choose_location_description: Choose your desired pickup and drop-off from a wide range of locations to suit your needs.
home.choose_day_time_description: Select your preferred pick-up and drop-off dates and times, let's find your best availability.
home.choose_car_description: Browse our fleet and find the perfect vehicle with your preferred options.
home.most_popular_car_rentals_description: Renting a car with us is a breeze! Simply browse our extensive fleet to find the perfect vehicle for your needs.
home.rent_perfect_car: Rent your perfect car with a big discount
home.unmatched_selection_description: With a vast fleet of vehicles, we offer the perfect car for every preference.
home.competitive_pricing_description: Enjoy affordable rental prices without compromising on quality or service.
home.convenient_locations_description: We have convenient pickup and drop-off locations to suit your travel needs.
home.flexible_rental_options_description: Need a car for a few hours, a day, or longer, we offer flexible rental options.

searchCard.error_location_date: You must set your location and both dates first.
searchCard.error_pickup_dropoff: Pick-up date cannot be later than the drop-off date.
searchCard.error_pickup_past: Pick-up date cannot be in the past.

footer.title: Get the latest offers and updates
footer.description: Stay informed with our exclusive deals, latest car models, and special promotions tailored just for you. Subscribe now!
footer.logo_description: Reliable car rentals, offering comfort and style for every journey you take.

about.title: About Us
about.ourStoryText: At Car Rento, we're passionate about providing hassle-free and enjoyable car rental experiences. With professionals having years of industry expertise, we've built a reputation for reliability, exceptional service, and a diverse fleet of vehicles to suit every need. Our team of dedicated professionals is committed to ensuring your journey is comfortable and memorable.
about.ourMissionText: Our mission is to make car rental a seamless and enjoyable experience for everyone. We strive to offer a diverse range of vehicles to suit every need, competitive pricing, and exceptional customer service. We believe that travel should be accessible and hassle-free, and we're committed to making that a reality.

customerSatisfaction.text: We prioritize the needs and satisfaction of our customers above all else.

reliability.text: We are dedicated to providing reliable and well-maintained vehicles.

innovation.text: We continuously seek new ways to enhance the customer experience.

integrity.text: We conduct our business with honesty, transparency, and ethical standards.

about.joinUsText: We invite you to experience the difference of renting from Car Rento. Whether you're planning a vacation, business trip, or road trip, we're here to make your journey unforgettable.
